{"step_by_step_thinking": "Hydroxyapatite crystals are the main mineral component of teeth and bones. Fluoride can substitute for the hydroxyl ion in hydroxyapatite crystals, forming fluorapatite. The substitution of fluoride for the hydroxyl ion in hydroxyapatite crystals imparts more strength to the crystals. Therefore, the answer is A. Hydroxyl ion.", "answer_choice": "A"}
